full_text:
Page 1151
Fwd: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION--EPSTEIN, JEFFREY
From NYM/Exec Assistant~
To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/09/18 11:28
Subject: Fwd: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION--EPSTEIN, JEFFREY
Attachments: TEXT.htm, JeffreyEpsteinRequest.pdf
>>> FORTS Registration Compliance Unit <FORTSRCU@fdle.state.fl.us> 9/18/2019 10:56 AM >>>
Good morning,
This is my second request for information concerning Jeffrey Epstein. The subject was a registered sexual offender in Florida and is currently on our public website as Federal Incarceration. In order for FDLE to change his status to deceased, we need some kind of documentation from your facility confirming his death.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Certified Law Enforcement Analyst
Criminal Justice Information Consultant I
Enforcement and Investigative Services
Florida Department of Law Enforcement
Phone (850)410(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Fax (850)410-8599
Hotline (888)-357-7332
Page 2976
DOJ-OGR-00025373
